html: Trump’s budget would cut $9.85M from RI's Supporting Effective Instruction State Grant, which helps school districts pay for #profdev for educators & hire more teachers, resulting in smaller class sizes. Eliminating these funds could cost RI equivalent of 150 teacher salaries.
text: Trump’s budget would cut $9.85M from RI's Supporting Effective Instruction State Grant, which helps school districts pay for #profdev for educators & hire more teachers, resulting in smaller class sizes. Eliminating these funds could cost RI equivalent of 150 teacher salaries.

html: Trump’s budget would take $5.64 Million from RI’s share of the Student Support and Academic Enrichment Grants. These funds support a variety of critical functions, including improving school conditions, student health and safety, and expanding the use of educational technology.
text: Trump’s budget would take $5.64 Million from RI’s share of the Student Support and Academic Enrichment Grants. These funds support a variety of critical functions, including improving school conditions, student health and safety, and expanding the use of educational technology.

html: After-school programs offer hope, opportunity, safety, & student enrichment. But Trump's budget would slash $6M from RI's 21st Century Community Learning Centers funds that support #afterschool programs such as @MyPASA. These cuts would harm kids, working families, & our economy.
text: After-school programs offer hope, opportunity, safety, & student enrichment. But Trump's budget would slash $6M from RI's 21st Century Community Learning Centers funds that support #afterschool programs such as @MyPASA. These cuts would harm kids, working families, & our economy.

html: Keeping kids safe, fed, enriched & supervised after the school day ends is a smart investment that strengthens communities, helps kids succeed, & provides working parents w/ peace of mind. A big thank you to @MyPASA for their outstanding work & advocacy. #AfterSchoolWorks

html: Today, the full US Senate voted 50-49 to overturn Trump Admin’s #darkmoney rule that exempts some organizations from disclosing large donors to the IRS. This is a positive step for fair elections. Now the House must also act on bipartisan basis.
text: Today, the full US Senate voted 50-49 to overturn Trump Admin’s #darkmoney rule that exempts some organizations from disclosing large donors to the IRS. This is a positive step for fair elections. Now the House must also act on bipartisan basis.

html: US Senate voted 87-13 to pass bipartisan #FarmBill. Several key wins for RI #farmers & families: will help small farms, feed families in need, boost local farmers markets, enhance conservation, legalize industrial #hemp, & expand #cropinsurance access to #shellfish growers.

text:
Today is a day of solemn remembrance.
100 years after the #armistice, we honor those who fought so bravely in #WWI & all #veterans.
Let us endeavor to be worthy of their sacrifice; Rise to match their courage; & Build a more peaceful, free, & just future they fought for.

text:
Saddened & angered by another tragic #schoolshooting.
Congress should follow example of those brave enough to confront adversity, not hide from it.
Congress can take needed, bipartisan steps to help reduce #gunviolence, if lawmakers can summon the courage. RI stands w/ #SanteFe.

html: Good news for consumers & #freespeech: US Senate just voted 52-47 to pass a CRA overturning the Trump Admin’s repeal of #NetNeutrality rules. This is a key step toward preserving a fair & open Internet. Now we must keep pressure on the House to vote & help #SaveTheInternet!
text: Good news for consumers & #freespeech: US Senate just voted 52-47 to pass a CRA overturning the Trump Admin’s repeal of #NetNeutrality rules. This is a key step toward preserving a fair & open Internet. Now we must keep pressure on the House to vote & help #SaveTheInternet!

html: Senate now voting on motion to proceed on #NetNeutrality CRA. The big vote on the CRA itself will come around 3 pm. So there is still time to make your voice heard & tell Senators to protect fair, open, & free Internet access for all Americans.

html: I strongly disagree w/ Pres Trump’s decision to pardon Scooter Libby. Timing is curious & may be viewed as a signal by Trump to his former aides & associates who’ve plead guilty to similar crimes that he's willing to pardon individuals who don’t cooperate w/ law enforcement.
text: I strongly disagree w/ Pres Trump’s decision to pardon Scooter Libby. Timing is curious & may be viewed as a signal by Trump to his former aides & associates who’ve plead guilty to similar crimes that he's willing to pardon individuals who don’t cooperate w/ law enforcement.

html: The Trump Admin’s #NetNeutrality revocation order was published today. That means the 2 month clock is ticking: Net Neutrality rules will officially expire on April 23 unless we act. Help #SaveTheInternet. Urge Congress to pass a CRA to restore the Open Internet Order.
text:
The Trump Admin’s #NetNeutrality revocation order was published today. That means the 2 month clock is ticking: Net Neutrality rules will officially expire on April 23 unless we act. 

Help #SaveTheInternet. 

Urge Congress to pass a CRA to restore the Open Internet Order.
